incidents.title: Database maintenance
incidents.content:
We will be changing the configuration of our Postgres database instance at 2020-09-01T23:00UTC. There may be a few minutes of down time for https://hub.stenci.la during this process but running sessions should not be affected.

2020-09-01T23:09:00.000Z
Resolved

Resizing of the database instance is complete. Our monitoring indicates that https://hub.stenci.la was unavailable for approximately two minutes during this maintenance period.

incidents.title: Session Provisioning
incidents.content: While scaling the Worker pods, an issue with the Kubernetes configuration is preventing Session Jobs from being taken off the Queue, causing indefinite wait times when attempting to execute a document.

incidents.title: Database upgrade
incidents.content:
We will be upgrading our database instance at 2020-08-16T23:00UTC. There may be a few minutes of down time during this process.

2020-08-16T23:22:56.289Z
Resolved

The database instance has been upgraded and is operating as expected. Our monitoring indicates that https://hub.stenci.la was unavailable for approximately two minutes during this upgrade.

incidents.title: Data migration
incidents.content: We are in the process of migrating the Hub from v2 centered on the director service and deployed on the us-nw-1 cluster to v3 centered on the manager service (which replaced director) and deployed on the us-ce-1 cluster.
